short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promotes critical thinking by generating questions about selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Critical thinking is the single most important skill needed in today's world. The Questioner brings it right into your browser. Just highlight whatever content you're reading -- whether it's a social media post, an article, or an academic treatise -- right click, select "Question This" and you'll get three incisive questions that are guaranteed to make you think more deeply about the topic.

Note: This extension requires an OpenAI API key to function.
